title: Occultist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Scry. You will learn if they are suspicious or innocent.
- At night, choose a player to Maledict. Gain 8 stress and learn their role. If they're evil, they become aware that you learned their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you Scry someone and find innocence, heal 1 stress.
- Both your abilities can be fooled by Frames.
- You may not Maledict until an Estate member is in the graveyard.
